thread.title: Now hiring: Forklift operators, installers, developers, more

title: Now hiring: Forklift operators, installers, developers, more
text:
1. Database administrator : McCalla Raymer in Roswell is seeking a d atabase administrator to manage Microsoft SQL servers, BI SSIS, SSRS and SSAS in VMW environment. [ Apply today ]
2. Project manager : Lemcon in Peachtree Corners is seeking a project manager with a B.S. in electrical/telecommunications. [ Apply today ]
3. Sr. specialist : AT&T Mobility Services in Roswell is hiring a sr. specialist to analyze, design, program, debug and modify software enhancements and new products. [ Apply today ]
4. Installers/Low-voltage techs : Tebarco Door in Atlanta has openings for installers and low-voltage techs with commercial doors, frames and hardware experience. [ Apply today ]
5. Sr. software engineer : Orpine of Alpharetta is seeking a sr. software engineer to design, develop, test and maintain application software using Java, J2EE, HTML, Webservices, RestFull Webservices, Spring, more. [ Apply today ]
6. Lead system consultant : Verizon in Atlanta is seeking a lead system consultant to implement, administer and test Oracle SOA Suite, Oracle Application Integration Architecture, Oracle Application Server, more. [ Apply today ]
7. System specialist : Verizon in Atlanta is seeking a system specialist to provide technical and analytical support in IT quality assurance including testing enterprise information systems, communication protocol, more. [ Apply today ]
8. Senior consultant : Verizon in Atlanta is seeking a senior consultant to create and implement product strategy and roadmap. [ Apply today ]
9. Accountant : BDO is hiring an accountant to resolve accounting issues, apply GAAP (Generally Accepted Accounting Principles) and GAAS (Generally Accepted Auditing Standards). [ Apply today ]
10. Sr. automation developer : Ocher of Alpharetta is seeking a sr. automation developer to manage Selenium IDE, Selenium 2 Webdriver, cucumber and UFT/QTP for web applications with SOAP and REST services. [ Apply today ]
11. Sr. database developer : Intercontinental Exchange Holdings in Atlanta seeks a sr. database developer to focus on development and maintenance of various database applications supporting Risk Mgmt for all ICE clearing houses. [ Apply today ]
12. Software developer in test : Parkmobile in Atlanta is seeking a software developer in test to develop and apply manual and automated testing structures and toolsets to existing processes used by quality assurance team. [ Apply today ]
13. Forklift operators : Southwest Forklift in Atlanta is seeking a warehousing f orklift operator with or without experience; willing to train and certify. [ Apply today ]
